body:
Comment 7: 
#go13

With 4714 marked as Go1.3 I think we're close enough to be able to add android/arm
support to Go1.3 too. I can do the work (based on the prototype goandroid patchset), as
soon as a proposal is agreed upon. Mine is here:
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QcMuZYgEHLBQSGcFXT7YwUkvI1hRxxvXWjOo6MQ_F9k/edit
